Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Wildlife
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 14, 2013

Winterwatch is presented by Chris Packham, Martin Hughes-Games and Michaela Strachan. The team are at a base in the Scottish Highlands as they attempt to capture the beauty, drama and spectacle of the country’s most iconic animals as they battle to survive the this challenging time of year. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33885)
